data.author: Kazushi Kurasawa
data.message:

* 不要な記号等の削除

* fixed typo

* 表現の修正

* PackageやTopicの説明を箇条書きの形式に変更

* 不要な箇条書きを削除

---------

data.author: Kazushi Kurasawa
data.message:
ROS 2 Jazzyへの対応 (#53)

* Replaced "Twist" with "TwistStamped" (Changed in all instances, revert if any unexpected issues occur, "revert").

* "README.md"をROS 2 Jazzyの対応に合わせて修正

* 表示できていなかった実機の画像リンクを修正

* 変更点の反映と、不足手順を追記

* Updated documentation for compatibility with ROS 2 Jazzy
[Note] Updated major version due to breaking changes in "/cmd_vel" backwards compatibility.

* Revert "Updated documentation for compatibility with ROS 2 Jazzy"

This reverts commit 69bcbd5db1b76153e5aacfc7b9379a2022971195.

* add author to package.xml

* Updated the environment variables in "industrial_ci.yml" to Jazzy

* Removed unnecessary steps for launching the launch file in the "README.md"

* Corrected import order to comply with flake8

* Applied "isort"

* Sort import-modules for flake8

* Replace the CI script with syntax supported by act

* Update README.md (.bash extension completion)

Co-authored-by: YusukeKato <YusukeKato@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update checkout version of GitHub Action

Co-authored-by: YusukeKato <YusukeKato@users.noreply.github.com>

---------

Co-authored-by: YusukeKato <YusukeKato@users.noreply.github.com>
